## Problem Statement

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="57%"}
1. Take a simulation time of $\delta t = 0.1\,$s.
2. Create an RRT tree.
3. Find a path that takes the robot from the initial configuration $q_s =
\begin{pmatrix} \frac{5}{4} & \frac{1}{4} & 60^\circ \end{pmatrix}^\top$ to the
goal configuration $q_\bigstar = \begin{pmatrix} 2-\frac{\varepsilon}{2} & 0 &
-90^\circ \end{pmatrix}^\top$.
4. Submit your solution and the created RRT tree as a plot or as a simulation.
:::
